info.summary1:
Iâ€™m a Fullstack JavaScript Engineer with 9 years of experience building and scaling web applications. I specialize in both modern frontend frameworks like React and Angular and backend technologies such as Node, Express, and MongoDB.

Over the years, Iâ€™ve worked on automating CI/CD pipelines, designing microservices, and improving application performance. I enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams, tackling legacy code challenges, and creating user-focused solutions that deliver real business impact.

Iâ€™m passionate about clean, maintainable code, following best practices like TDD and scalable design patterns, and building software that truly meets user needs while staying technically robust.

Worked across microfrontend and microservice boundaries to deliver reliable production releases.

Improved inbox throughput and reduced manual triage time with automated classification and cleanup pipelines.

APHP.title: Project Intern @ AP-HP, Assistance Publique - HÃ´pitaux de Paris

projects.title: Grafana K6 Login Load Test API
projects.description: This project demonstrates how to use K6 to load test a simple Node.js login API connected to MongoDB. The K6 script simulates multiple users logging in concurrently, allowing you to analyze the API's performance under load. The results are visualized in Grafana, providing insights into response times and throughput.
projects.tags: K6, Load Testing, Grafana, Node.js, MongoDB, Performance Testing, API Testing, JavaScript

projects.title: LinkedinCrew â€“ Automated LinkedIn Research & Analysis Tool
projects.description: LinkedinCrew is a Python-based project that automates LinkedIn-related research and tasks. It ensures proper environment setup, parses command-line arguments, and initiates the LinkedinCrew process using a specified topic and year. The project requires an OpenAI API key for execution.
projects.tags: crewAI, n8n, Python, Automation, LinkedIn, AI, OpenAI API, Command-Line Tool, Scripting

projects.title: Simple Node User management API using Clean Architecture
projects.description: This project demonstrates the application of Clean Architecture in a Node.js API designed for user management. Using Express, TypeScript, and Dependency Injection, the API ensures maintainable and scalable code by adhering to the SOLID principles and emphasizing Separation of Concerns.
projects.tags: Node.js, Clean Architecture, TypeScript, User Management API, Express, Dependency Injection, SOLID Principles, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, JWT Authentication, CRUD Operations, Unit Testing, Jest, Mocking, API Design, Software Architecture, Scalability, Maintainability, Modular Code, Repository Pattern, API Endpoints, Use Cases, Data Persistence, TypeORM, Prisma, Express API

projects.title: Abstract Factory Pattern in React for Themed Components
projects.description: This project demonstrates the implementation of the Abstract Factory Pattern in React to create reusable components that adapt their appearance and behavior based on themes (light/dark). It utilizes React Context to dynamically switch between different UI factories.
projects.tags: React, Abstract Factory Pattern, Context API, Theming, Design Patterns, Reusable Components, TypeScript

projects.title: Okta SAML implementation for SSO
projects.description: This project demonstrates the implementation of SAML (Security Assertion Markup Language) for Single Sign-On (SSO) authentication.
projects.tags: Node, SAML, Okta, Single Sign-On, Authentication, Security, passport, passport-saml

projects.title: Users Restfull API built with NestJS
projects.description: This is a simple API built with NestJS for managing users.
projects.tags: Node, NestJS, RESTful API, TypeScript, CRUD, uuid, Dependency Injection, NestJS Modules, NestJS Services, NestJS Controllers

projects.title: Image Processing with Worker Threads
projects.description: his project demonstrates how to use Node Worker Threads to offload CPU-intensive image processing tasks, improving application responsiveness and performance.
projects.tags: Node, Express, Worker Threads, Parallel Processing, Sharp, Multer, Concurrency

projects.title: Gherkin-Cucumber Demo
projects.description: This project demonstrates how to use Gherkin syntax with Cucumber.js for behavior-driven development (BDD) testing. It includes automated tests for a login feature using Puppeteer for browser automation and Chai for assertions..
projects.tags: Gherkin, Cucumber, BDD, Testing, Automation, Puppeteer, Chai, JavaScript

projects.title: Vue-Java-Springboot Delivery Tracking System
projects.description: A full-stack delivery tracking system built with Vue.js and Java SpringBoot. The Vue frontend allows users to view and manage delivery orders with dynamic status updates, address modifications, and time slot adjustments. The Springboot backend handles API requests for fetching and updating deliveries, ensuring seamless communication between the UI and the database. The system supports role-based interactions for buyers and sellers, providing restricted input fields and actions based on user roles.
projects.tags: Vue.js, Java, SpringBoot Delivery Tracking, Full-Stack, API, REST API, CRUD Operations, Axios, JavaScript

projects.title: Angular-Express Authentication Starter: JWT-Based Secure Login System
projects.description: Boilerplate project that integrates Angular and Express for user authentication. It features a login system where users enter credentials, which are validated by an Express backend using bcrypt. A JWT token is generated and returned to the frontend, where it is stored and used to manage authentication state through an Angular service and BehaviorSubject, ensuring UI updates.
projects.tags: Angular, Express, Authentication, JWT, Node, bcrypt, User Login, Token-Based Authentication, Secure Login, Full-Stack, MEAN Stack, AuthService, BehaviorSubject, API Security

projects.title: Dockerized React & Node Full-Stack App with Mysql
projects.description: This Docker Compose configuration setup orchestrates multiple services to create a seamless development environment for a todo application. Traefik serves as the reverse proxy, efficiently routing traffic between the backend API, frontend client, and phpMyAdmin interface. The MySQL service is configured with persistent storage, and development-specific settings enable real-time code synchronization and automatic rebuilding of services upon code changes.
projects.tags: Docker, Treafik, Reverse Proxy, Code Sync, Automatic rebuild, phpMyAdmin, Docker Compose, React, Node, MySQL, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Containers, Compose, Dockerfile, Vite, Nodemon, TodoApp

projects.title: Scalable Session Management System with Express, Redis, and Monitoring Tools
projects.description: A scalable and secure session management system built with Express and Redis, designed for high-performance applications. This project ensures efficient user authentication, protected routes, and session handling with centralized storage. Enhanced with Docker for containerization and integrated with Prometheus and Grafana for real-time monitoring and performance metrics. Ideal for applications requiring robust scalability and advanced session management capabilities.
projects.tags: nodemon, npm, bcrypt, connect-redis, dotenv, Express, express-session, prom-client, redis, redis-info, Node, Express, Redis, Session Management, Authentication, Authorization, Docker, Prometheus, Grafana, Metrics Monitoring, Persistence, RDB, AOF

projects.title: Redis Checkin Social App
projects.description: The project involves developing a social network application where users can 'check in' at various locations and provide star ratings (0 to 5) based on their experiences. The application leverages Redis as both a data store and a cache to manage data efficiently. The core entities in the application are Users, Locations, and Checkins, each mapped to Redis data types for optimal storage and retrieval. The application will also include an API to interact with the data and support asynchronous processing for real-time updates.
projects.tags: ioredis, Redis JSON, Docker, Node, Redis Streams, Redis Pub/Sub, Redis Data Types, Social Network, Checkin, Ratings, API, Asynchronous Processing, Real-Time Updates, Data Storage, Data Retrieval, Cache, Data Store

projects.title: Debounce Demo: Prevent Excessive API Calls on Button Clicks
projects.description: A minimal app that showcases debouncing to stop multiple API calls when a button is rapidly clicked. Once clicking pauses, a single API request is made, reducing server load and boosting performance.
projects.tags: Debounce, API Calls, Performance, JavaScript, Optimization

projects.title: Fullstack TodoApp with Angular, Node, and Postgres
projects.description: Full-stack Todo app featuring an intuitive Angular-powered UI, a Node backend with RESTful APIs, real-time updates via WebSockets, and secure authentication. It's Dockerized for seamless deployment and includes an analytics dashboard for productivity tracking.
projects.tags: Angular, Node, WebSockets, Docker, SQLite, RESTful APIs, Authentication, Dashboard, Full-Stack, Real-Time Updates, Postgres, Supabase

projects.title: E-Commerce Website with Angular and Node
projects.description: E-commerce platform that integrates both front-end and back-end development tasks. On the front-end, it features product listing, shopping cart functionalities, a contact form, pagination, filtering, and product quantity adjustments. The back-end is built using Node/Express, and includes API development with CRUD operations, JWT-based user authentication, and management of shopping carts and wishlists.
projects.tags: E-Commerce, Angular, Node, RxJS, Postman, JWT Authentication, CRUD, API, Express, Shopping Cart, Wishlist, Pagination, Filtering, Contact Form, Front-End, Back-End, Full-Stack, PrimeNG, Observables, Reactive Programming, Signals, Events, Data Flow, State Management, Typescript, Dependency Injection

Master.degree: MSc in Mechatronic Systems for Rehabilitation (M1)
